item.title: The River Wing at the Mandarin Oriental, Bangkok is undergoing renovations
item.description: The Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group is embarking on a renovation project for the River Wing of the Mandarin Oriental, Bangkok, aiming to solidify the historic hotel’s standing as a top-tier establishment. Starting in March 2019, the seven-month renovation will encompass all rooms and suites within the River Wing, as well as the lobby, swimming pools, and dining venues: Lord Jim’s, The Verandah, and Riverside Terrace. The hotel’s Authors’ and Garden Wings will remain operational throughout.

item.title: Kuwait Finance House introduces the Bunyani financing campaign for completion works
item.description: Kuwait Finance House (KFH) has introduced a new campaign called “Bunyani… from skeleton structure to delivery” to provide financing options for owners of residential, investment, and industrial land plots. This campaign aims to help customers complete various construction phases, including finishing works, maintenance, and restoration. Ahmad Al-Khaled, Deputy General Manager Commercial Services at KFH, stated that the campaign offers clients simplified financing solutions. These include financing of up to KD70,000, a repayment period of 15 years, a grace period of 12 months for the first installment, and a competitive profit rate.
